Agenda Types of Computing ● Desktop computing ● Server client computing ● Grid computing ● Cluster computing ● Cloud computing
It is use of stand alone Personal Computer called Desktop computing. Example: (Storage,game,music,movie) Desktop Computing:
Server client computing: It is a group of computer are connected in LAN is called Server client computing.
Cluster Computing: It is a type of computing runs with multiple server with same service called Cluster Computing.

Grid & Cloud Computing: Grid Computing: It is a type of computing running multiple server with same service in many different locations. Cloud Computing: It is use of remote server rather than local server is called Cloud Computing.
